featured_projects.title: Personal Portfolio Website
featured_projects.description: Modern, responsive portfolio website built with vanilla HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript. Features dynamic GitHub integration, smooth animations, and accessibility-first design.
featured_projects.long_description: A comprehensive portfolio website showcasing my technical skills and projects. Built from scratch using semantic HTML5, custom CSS with design tokens, and vanilla JavaScript for optimal performance. Features include dynamic GitHub API integration, responsive mobile-first design, smooth scroll navigation, and WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility compliance.
challenges: Creating a design system from scratch
Implementing smooth animations without affecting performance
Optimizing for both mobile and desktop experiences
learned: Advanced CSS Grid and Flexbox techniques
JavaScript intersection observer for scroll animations

featured_projects.title: Task Manager Application
featured_projects.description: Full-stack task management application with real-time collaboration features, built using React, Node.js, and MongoDB.
featured_projects.long_description: A comprehensive task management solution designed for teams and individuals. Features real-time collaboration, drag-and-drop task organization, deadline tracking, and team member assignment. Built with modern web technologies and focusing on user experience and performance.
challenges: Implementing real-time synchronization across multiple users
Optimizing database queries for large datasets
Managing complex state across multiple components

featured_projects.title: Weather Dashboard
featured_projects.description: Interactive weather application with location-based forecasts, historical data visualization, and customizable widgets.
featured_projects.long_description: A modern weather dashboard that provides comprehensive weather information with beautiful data visualizations. Features include current conditions, 7-day forecasts, interactive maps, historical weather data, and customizable dashboard widgets. Built with a focus on data visualization and user experience.
challenges: Designing intuitive user interface for complex data
learned: API rate limiting and caching strategies

featured_projects.title: E-commerce Platform
featured_projects.description: Full-featured e-commerce solution with payment processing, inventory management, and admin dashboard.
featured_projects.long_description: A complete e-commerce platform designed for small to medium businesses. Includes product catalog management, shopping cart functionality, secure payment processing, order tracking, and comprehensive admin dashboard. Built with scalability and security as primary concerns.

featured_projects.title: Blog Content Management System
featured_projects.description: Custom CMS for blog management with markdown support, SEO optimization, and multi-author capabilities.
featured_projects.long_description: A powerful content management system designed specifically for bloggers and content creators. Features include markdown editor with live preview, SEO optimization tools, multi-author support, comment system, and analytics integration. Built with content creators' workflow in mind.
features: Rich markdown editor with live preview
challenges: Building a rich text editor experience
